akn:section.akn:heading: Marine Corps officers: limitation on power to command

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 8164. Marine Corps officers: limitation on power to command Officers of the Marine Corps may not command vessels or naval shipyards. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 371, § 5944; renumbered § 8164, Pub. L. 115–232, div. A, title VIII, § 807(b)(5), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 1834.)
Historical and Revision Notes
Revised sectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
594434 U.S.C. 713.R.S. 1617.
The words “of the United States” are omitted as surplusage. The word “command” is substituted for the words “exercise command over any”.
